code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./campaign.css';import store from'../../../../../store/store';import{loadCampaign,deleteCamp}from'../../../../../actions';import{useHistory}from'react-router-dom';import axios from'axios';var Campaign=function Campaign(_ref){var campId=_ref.campId,campName=_ref.campName;var _useHistory=useHistory(null),push=_useHistory.push;return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"content"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"campName"},campName),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"loadButtonHolder"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"loadButton",onClick:function onClick(){store.dispatch(loadCampaign({campId:campId,campName:campName}));push("/dashboard/loadedcamp");}},"Load"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"deleteButton loadButton",onClick:function onClick(){axios.delete("https://emailengine2020.herokuapp.com/camprud/".concat(campId,"/")).then(function(res){console.log(res);store.dispatch(deleteCamp(campId));});}},"Delete")));};export default Campaign;
